headline: Is Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.B) Still Offering Value After Strong Multi‑Year Gains?
summary: If you have ever wondered whether Berkshire Hathaway is fairly priced or still offering value at current levels, this breakdown is for you. The stock last closed at US$499.10, with returns of 0.5% over the past week, a 0.1% decline over the past month, and 0.5% year to date, alongside a 12.8% 1 year return, 57.1% 3 year return, and 113.8% 5 year return.
